sqlMap.select: select cash_flow_category_id as cashFlowCategoryId, name as name, is_debit as isDebit, is_enabled as isEnabled, cash_flow_type as cashFlowType, created_by as createdBy, created_date as createDate, changed_by as changedBy, changed_date as changedDate from master_cash_flow_category where is_enabled = 1

select cash_flow_category_id as cashFlowCategoryId, name as name, is_debit as isDebit, is_enabled as isEnabled, cash_flow_type as cashFlowType, created_by as createdBy, created_date as createDate, changed_by as changedBy, changed_date as changedDate from master_cash_flow_category where is_enabled = 1 and cash_flow_category_id = #cashFlowCategoryId#
